rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C193260

self.title: CDISC Clinical Classification Tanner Scale Girl TANN0102 Standardized Character Response Terminology

definition: Tanner Scale Girl standardized character result for TANN0102 test and test code.
name: Tanner Scale Girl Clinical Classification STRESC for TANN0102 TN/TC
preferredTerm: CDISC Clinical Classification Tanner Scale Girl TANN0102 Standardized Character Response Terminology
synonyms: Tanner Scale Girl Clinical Classification STRESC for TANN0102 TN/TC

terms.definition: Tanner Scale Girl standardized character result for TANN0102-Stage 1: Pre-adolescent; the vellus over the pubes is not further developed than that over the anterior abdominal wall, i.e. no pubic hair.
terms.preferredTerm: Tanner Scale Girl TANN0102 Standardized Character Result Stage 1

terms.definition: Tanner Scale Girl standardized character result for TANN0102-Stage 2: Sparse growth of long, slightly pigmented, downy hair, straight or only slightly curled, appearing chiefly along the labia. This stage is difficult to see on photographs, particularly of fair-haired subjects. Though Stage 2 rating was used in this study, it cannot be regarded as reliable, and the ages at which subjects are said to have reached Stage 2 are almost certainly too late.
terms.preferredTerm: Tanner Scale Girl TANN0102 Standardized Character Result Stage 2

terms.definition: Tanner Scale Girl standardized character result for TANN0102-Stage 3: Considerably darker, coarser, and more curled. The hair spreads sparsely over the junction of the pubes. This and subsequent stages were clearly recognizable on the photographs.
terms.preferredTerm: Tanner Scale Girl TANN0102 Standardized Character Result Stage 3

terms.definition: Tanner Scale Girl standardized character result for TANN0102-Stage 4: Hair is now adult in type, but the area covered by it is still considerably smaller than in most adults. There is no spread to the medial surface of the thighs.
terms.preferredTerm: Tanner Scale Girl TANN0102 Standardized Character Result Stage 4

terms.definition: Tanner Scale Girl standardized character result for TANN0102-Stage 5: Adult in quantity and type, distributed as an inverse triangle of the classically feminine pattern. Spread to the medial surface of the thighs, but not up the linea alba or elsewhere above the base of the inverse triangle.
terms.preferredTerm: Tanner Scale Girl TANN0102 Standardized Character Result Stage 5
